caption: Algorithm 2 [Online Item Allocation]
description: Algorithm 2 provides a pseudocode representation of the online item allocation process within the paper's model.  It details how, at each time step t, an algorithm (ALG) uses the history (Ht) of past allocations to produce a fractional allocation (Xt).  An item type (kt) is sampled from a distribution (D), and then the item is allocated to a player (it) according to the probabilities in Xt. The algorithm maintains the allocation (Ai) for each player and the history (Ht). Finally, the complete allocation A is returned after all T items have been allocated.
